name: Documentation Update Reminder
description: Remind to update documentation when session ends

action.message:
Session complete. Please check if documentation needs updates:

1. **Product specs**: New features, spec changes, performance improvements
2. **Technical docs**: Architecture changes, optimizations, new patterns
3. **Project structure**: File organization changes
4. **Bug reports**: Mark resolved bugs with PR links

If updates are needed, reflect the changes and record in the update history section.
